rdf:Description.dc:title: Aquathermolysis : a synopsis of work on the chemical reaction between water (steam) and heavy oil sands during simulated steam stimulation 1986 a synopsis of work on the chemical reaction between water (steam) and heavy oil sands during simulated steam stimulation /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Hyne, J. B., 1929-
Alberta Oil Sands Technology and Research Authority.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alberta : AOSTRA Library and Information Service],
rdf:Description.dc:description: Summary of experimental evidence that the chemical consequences of in-situ steam stimulation in production of oil from heavy oil sands, should be optimized because they affect viscosity of produced oil and maturation of the regions of the reservoir around the production zone, among other topics.
AB Alberta Research Council*c.2 does not include series information for the Technical Report.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Oil sands
Secondary recovery of oil.
